original_text:
The seeds are shriveled
    beneath the clods.
The storehouses are in ruins,
    the granaries have been broken down,
    for the grain has dried up.
korean_text: 씨가 흙덩이 아래에서 썩어졌고 창고가 비었고 곳간이 무너졌으니 이는 곡식이 시들었음이로다

sentences.original_text: The seeds are shriveled beneath the clods.
the granaries have been broken down,
for the grain has dried up.
